dcterms:description: The DynaCap dataset consists of multi-view video recordings of human actors in various articulated poses, used for training and evaluating methods for character rigging and skinning.
dcterms:title: DynaCap dataset

dcterms:creator: Peike Li
Yunqiu Xu
Yunchao Wei
Yi Yang
dcterms:description: The LIP dataset is used for human parsing tasks, providing labeled images for segmenting human body parts.
dcterms:title: LIP dataset

dcterms:creator: Zhan Xu
Yang Zhou
Evangelos Kalogerakis
Chris Landreth
Karan Singh
dcterms:description: The ModelsResource-RigNetv1 dataset contains a collection of 3D character models with artist-designed skeletons and skinning weights, used for training neural rigging methods.
dcterms:title: ModelsResource-RigNetv1 dataset
